title: Beautifully Broken
description: When unemployed Katie Summers meets hottie, John Lukeman everything in her life instantly changes!Katie knows that happily-ever-after is a myth, especially when her crush asks her to be his dog walker. Even if he is good-looking and wealthy and charming.John knows a relationship is impossible, especially with a young woman as grouchy as Katie is. Even if she does wear sexy shoes and keeps him on his toes.But it seems that destiny has other plans for these two, because John isn't the nerdy business man that Katie imagines, and Katie—despite her crazy mood swings—is just about the most determined woman John has ever met.Before long, desire will end up on a moonlit cruise without a lifeboat...chancing it all in search of a love that could last forever.
author: Shery A. Soule
